issue.title: [Rust] Concatenating dictionaries ignores values
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12426](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12426). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Concatenating dictionaries ignores the values array, at best leading to incorrect data, but often leading to keys with indexes beyond the bounds of the values array
